ygData.subject: General Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Question #1: Even before i started my SK, i had every intention of using archery as a offensive tactic. However, starting in Qeynos, there were no fletching
ygData.messageBody:
Question #1:
Even before i started my SK, i had every intention of using archery as
a offensive tactic.
However, starting in Qeynos, there were no fletching supplies available
to make arrows, (unless i went to Surefall, which would have been a
very bad idea) and being a newbie, was too cheap to buy them ready made
from a vendor.
Now im not a newbie and am still too cheap to buy them.
I am currently in Freeport, does anyone know where i can buy ALL the
fletching supplies i need to make arrows?

Question #2:
Are pets allowed to fight in duels or guildwars on any server but the
+PvP?
Ive meant to try this but keep getting involved with other things. But
im at work now and bored, so i figured i just ask :)

Question #3:
I just hit level 15 and got my second set of spells, but havent had a
chance to use them yet.
Is this the pet that has the magical attack?
And if we have a pet and cast Shadow Step, does he commit suicide
thinking we disappeared while in the teleportation stage?

And just a note on archery. Apparently there are some pretty good bows
out there that do a good 15 to 17 dmg per hit. So archery can be just
as good as using a mino axe up close, but you dont have to worry about
getting hit melee wise.

Any info will be appreciated.
Thanks

Bathory
Cazic-Thule
